description: Campaigners for anti-racism lessons in Manx schools say "both sides of the story" should be taught.
title: Isle of Man schools must not 'shy away' from Manx slavery links
title_page: Isle of Man schools must not 'shy away' from Manx slavery links - BBC News
maintext: Ms Wiltshire said lessons should be used to "really talk about those people who were oppressed and who were treated in this absolutely horrible way, to really drive the point home that these were people".
